name: Walls&Holes (matthieu.pouliquen)
description:
A local multiplayer game where you are trapped in a maze. You have to find the items before the other player to win ! Your path is the other walls and you can destroy his walls to create a new path for you.

The result of a game jam with :

- Alexis  JULLIEN
- Florentin ROLLET
- Matthieu POULIQUEN
- Raphaël 'Qwerd' CARLY
